title: The Pleasure Den
description: Book 4 of Stories From The BoxJacky has a special room she calls the Pleasure Den. Here she can act out her exhibitionism and sex cravings. Tonight she's promised Miss Bojangles to put up a special webcam-show. It involves her remote-controlled bullet vibrator which she will allow Miss Bojangles to control through an app on her smartphone. But who is Miss Bojangles? Is Jacky taking a risk she might regret?
author: Patricia  Ray
